channel.title: Why are ppl on priv servers so agressive?
channel.description:
For example. I guy on my server asked for mod. And i said no asking. Then he went apeshit and was like IM GUNNA CRASH UR SERVER BITCH. but i got connection filter so nothing happened.
Ive had many things like this happen.
So WHY are people so agressive?

item.title: Why are ppl on priv servers so agressive?
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

Lol agree it happens all the time lol there just noobs who have no life =Þ

Read full topic

item.title: Why are ppl on priv servers so agressive?
item.dc:creator: @andrew4444 andrew4444
item.description:
@andrew4444 wrote:

They’re most likely jealous they don’t have the mental capability to run their own server.

Read full topic
item.source: Why are ppl on priv servers so agressive?

item.title: Why are ppl on priv servers so agressive?
item.dc:creator: @Hello_RSPS Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Hello_RSPS wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:8, topic:331425”]lol i never said that all 12 year olds were immature but take this guy for an example.

noob: make me mod.
me: no.
noob: make me mod.
me: no.
noob: make me mod.
me: no.
noob: make me mod.
me: no.
noob: make me mod.
me: no.
noob: fuck oyu make me mod!
me: no.

*switch to run.bat*

client 1: noob1
client 2: noob2
client 3: noob3
client 4: noob4
client 5: noob5

*switch to server client*

noob1: make mod!
noob2: make mod!
noob3: make mod!
noob4: make mod!
noob5: make mod!
*spams till mute all accounts*

noob: omg why did you mute me?
me: you were spamming
noob: noob, i wasn't spamming fuck you
me: ::ipban noob

lol that actually happened to me on my server :P[/quote]

Yez, really hate those faggots… Ban them all. Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are ppl on priv servers so agressive?
item.dc:creator: @Hello_RSPS Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Hello_RSPS wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:6, topic:331425”]off topic: belongs in general questions.
on topic: lol i agree… there was this guy who told me “nice server” trhen right away asked for mod and when i said no…
“omg your server sucks ima crash your server fuck you”
lol people on servers are aggressive beacuse lot’s of players are usually under 12 years old and they haven’t matured enough yet ;)[/quote]

Lol, agree with that. Im 12 but i think im pretty mature. xD
